name: YesBot
0:
”Alexa, open Yes Bot”
”Alexa, ask Yes Bot if my daughter still needs to clean her room.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yes bot
des: Need to say yes to something but don't want to do it yourself? Tired of telling your children YES, they need to clean their room? Someone pestering you for confirmation? From the maker of No Bot comes Yes Bot, with plenty of ways to say yes! Ask it any question and it will respond "Yes" in one of many ways!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
